faq.title: Question about PlexView? Answers about PlexView.
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about PlexView

items.question: Who is PlexView for?
items.answer:
PlexView is designed for all property owners looking to simplify, optimize, and professionalize the management of their rental properties.

 Whether you’re a first-time landlord, an experienced owner, managing a larger real estate portfolio, or a property management business, the platform adapts to your needs and reality.

 PlexView is also a valuable asset for building contractors seeking to grow their clientele and access qualified mandates directly connected to the residential rental market.

items.question: How is my data protected?
items.answer: The security of your information is a top priority. All data is encrypted and hosted on secure servers that comply with personal data protection standards. You remain in full control of your data at all times.

items.question: What makes PlexView different from other solutions?
items.answer:
PlexView is redefining property management by combining technology, efficiency, and peace of mind.

 Designed for landlords who want to stay in control while reducing mental load, our platform merges intuitive management tools with an integrated network of qualified contractors, ready to step in for your building maintenance.

 Say goodbye to partial or rigid solutions. PlexView goes far beyond simple accounting or rental tracking: it’s a complete, flexible, and transparent approach that helps you save time, reduce surprises, and maintain better oversight — without giving up your autonomy.

 In one word: simplicity, performance, and service that meets your expectations.

items.question: What are PlexView's prices?
items.answer:
Our pricing plans are based on a flexible model tailored to the size of your property portfolio. Whether you manage a few units or several dozen, you’ll have full access to all features without unnecessary fees.
 Official pricing will be revealed at the launch of the beta version.

items.question: How do I join the beta?
items.answer: To join our beta program, simply fill out the registration form at the bottom of the page. Our team will contact you to introduce the platform and help you get started with PlexView.

paragraphs: The information we collect is used solely for the following purposes:
lists: Marketing and informational communication related to PlexView
Sending updates on the development of our platform

sections.heading: 3. Data storage and protection
paragraphs: Personal information is stored on secure servers and accessible only to authorized team members. We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or theft.

sections.heading: 4. Data retention period
paragraphs: We retain your information for a maximum period of 24 months after the date of submission, unless you request earlier deletion.

sections.heading: 5. Consent
paragraphs: By providing us with your personal information via our form, you consent to its collection and use in accordance with this policy. You may withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us at groupenoletandrews@gmail.com.

sections.heading: 6. Access, modification, and deletion
paragraphs: You have the right to view, correct, or delete your personal information held by PlexView. To exercise this right, please contact us at the email address above.
